definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: Objective To study the emergency rescue of basicranial fracture complicated with massive hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱底骨折並鼻腔大出血的急診治療措施。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss CT findings of skull base fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱底骨折的CT表現及診斷價值。

sentences.english: Image fusion was performed using thin slice scanning in the posterior fossa after the conventional CT scanning.
sentences.chinese: 先行常規平掃，再行顱底薄層掃描後進行圖像融合。

sentences.english: There was no significant difference in the incidence of basal fracture between groups which suffered different force direction.
sentences.chinese: 不同受力方向造成顱底骨折的發生率無顯著性差異。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the integrated injury evaluation of skull base fracture and its clinical significance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱底骨折臨牀綜合傷情的評估。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of image navigation in the operation of skull base ossifying fibroma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影像導航下顱底骨化纖維瘤全切的可能性。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical characteristics and treatment of patients with chordomas in the skull base.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱底脊索瘤的臨牀特點及治療。

sentences.english: Results Most of intracranial chondroma were located at the position of junctura cartilaginea of basicranial skeleton.
sentences.chinese: 結果顱內軟骨瘤主要發生在顱底軟骨的結合處。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical manifestations and diagnosis and treatment of cranial base myxoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對顱底黏液瘤臨牀特點及診治方法的認識。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical characteristic of skull base fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱底骨折臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Skull base chondrosarcomas may be confused with chordomas.
sentences.chinese: 顱底軟骨肉瘤可能與脊索瘤難於鑑別。

sentences.english: Methods 193 patients with skull base fracture were analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性分析193例顱底骨折患者的臨牀資料。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo evaluate the treatment of ossifying fibroma in paranasal sinuses which invaded the anterior skull base.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討侵犯前顱底的鼻竇骨化纖維瘤的手術治療。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnosis and treatment of basicranial parapharyngeal tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討側顱底咽旁間隙腫瘤的診斷和治療。
